channel.title: Need help compiling
channel.description:
I've asked Rune-Server, RuneLocus, and neither of them will help me, please do help me. Every time I try to compile something, I get this error in the cmd, and I have no idea how to fix it:
[code]javac: no source files Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue...[/code]
Help me please? There are my variables:
PATH: F:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
CLASSPATH: F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe
(It's F:\ because that's what I use; illegal copy of Windows 7 was sold with this PC. :x)

item.title: Need help compiling
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Aspire718, post:1, topic:517879”]I’ve asked Rune-Server, google, and neither of them will help me, please do help me. Every time I try to compile something, I get this error in the cmd, and I have no idea how to fix it:

javac: no source files Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue...

Help me please? There are my variables:

PATH:
F:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

CLASSPATH:
F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe

(It’s F:\ because that’s what I use; illegal copy of Windows 7 was sold with this PC. :x)[/quote]Its trying to compile files in a path set that doesnt exist.
